```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
# scrape the first page only
metacritic_html <-
  read_html("https://www.metacritic.com/browse/games/score/metascore/all/psvita/filtered")

title_vec <-
  metacritic_html %>% 
  html_nodes(".title h3") %>% 
  html_text()

# scrape the remaining 179 pages
for (i in 1:10) {
url <- paste("https://www.metacritic.com/browse/games/score/metascore/all/psvita/filtered?page=", i, sep = "")

metacritic_html <- read_html(url)

titles_100 <-
  metacritic_html %>% 
  html_nodes(".title h3") %>% 
  html_text() 

title_vec <- append(title_vec, titles_100)

}

games_df <- tibble(title = title_vec)
```
